thread.title: Newsom rolls out details of gun control ballot measure
thread.title_full: Newsom rolls out details of gun control ballot measure - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John Wildermuth
title: Newsom rolls out details of gun control ballot measure
text: A plan to strengthen California’s already tough gun control laws is going to the ballot instead of the Legislature because supporters worry about the hold the National Rifle Association and other pro-gun groups have on the state’s officeholders, Lt. Gov. Gavin Newsom said Thursday.
